panels.title: Register
panels.content: Choose a cause and commit to a running and fundraising goal. Smile and get ready for your adventure.

panels.title: Connect
panels.content: Connect your fitness app so your individual effort will add to our collective progress around the world.
panels.link: Connect with Strava or Map My Fitness

panels.title: Fundraise
panels.content: Update your supporter page and share it with your friends, family, and social network. The funds you raise empower girls around the world.

panels.title: Run
panels.content: From October 1 â€“ 31, get out and run. Run daily to win cool prizes and unlock fun rewards. Share your runs on social and inspire others to join the movement.
